title: DRDO transfers tech of Optronic Submarine Periscope to Paras Defence - Business Standard
content: DRDO transfers tech of Optronic Submarine Periscope to Paras Defence  Business Standard
description: This technology has been transferred to the Company by way of a Licensing Agreement for Transfer of Technology of Optronic Submarine Periscope by IRDE, DRDO. The DRDO Laboratory has also nominated Paras Defence and Space Technologies as the
